page.title: 05Employment.Barbridge.
page.content: This is dominantly an agricultural area,but due to modern farming methods and mechanisation,fewer employees are required,usually only the farmer and family.The two main employees are Dairy Crest(subsidiary of Milk M.Bd.) and Hurleston Water Treatment Works (N.W.Water Auth.)Dairy Crest employ 34 people-27 Bulk Milk Tanker Drivers, 3 Mechanics,2 Foremen,a Manager and a Clerk.They have 22 tankers collecting milk from farms daily taking it to dairies in Manchester and Wrexham. Hurleston Water Treatment Works employ 10 people-3 Operatives,5 Laboratory Technicians,a Driver Sampler and a Supervisor.Water from the Horseshoe Falls,Llangollen travels via the canal to Hurleston Reservoir from which it is pumped and treated for distribution to pumping stations in S.Cheshire.This is the Crewe & Nantwich Water Supply.
